The Manor comprises of 2 main rooms, The Great Drawing Room and The Piano Lounge. Our reception area over looks the front lawn, where a marquee can be erected for larger events. We also have a rather exclusive room called The Spanish Leather Room.

column1: Our catering team can provide a wide range of meals from a simple sandwich buffet to a lavish banquet.

We offer free car parking which is exclusive to your event. Our Manor house has been updated with the latest wireless network system. Our digital projector and technical assistance are also inclusive.
Flipcharts and pads, photocopying, transparencies, phone and fax are also available.
